description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the dashboard page of a fitness and nutrition app. It includes a main DashboardPage widget that displays summary info cards and a welcome message, as well as an internal _InfoCard widget for individual info panels.

classes.name: DashboardPage
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the main dashboard with overview info cards and a welcome message.

classes.name: _InfoCard
classes.description: A private stateless widget that displays a titled info card with a value.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the DashboardPage or _InfoCard, returning layout widgets.
